actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to authorize the District of Columbia to more fully utilize a police reserve corps.
short_title: District of Columbia Police Reserve Corps Act

summary.text: District of Columbia Police Reserve Corps Act - Authorizes the Commissioner of the District of Columbia to select, organize, train, and equip as reserve police officers individuals who may volunteer for duty in connection with the policing of the District of Columbia. Authorizes the District of Columbia Council to make rules and regulations to carry out the purposes of this Act. Authorizes the appropriation of not more than $350,000 to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: District of Columbia Police Reserve Corps Act
A bill to authorize the District of Columbia to more fully utilize a police reserve corps.
